physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features military personnel in the interior of a building. They are dressed in different military uniforms. At the left hand side of the photograph, a lone military personnel is standing up and hunched over to view some documents placed on a table. Directly in front of him is a group of military personnel who are seated. The right hand side of the photograph shows more seated military personnel, as well as others who are standing up. This seated group of people are looking at the lone military personnel who is standing up, at the right hand side of the photograph.
title_text: The Surrender of Singapore, September 1945 Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography World War, 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Great Britain, Army Capitulations, Military
